project.description: save the newest 3 ARM Ami's and delete the rest

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
python <<-EOS
import boto3 import collections import datetime import time import sys
def deleteAmis (imagesList): count=0 sortedAmis = sorted(imagesList,key=lambda im: im.creation_date, reverse=True) for image in sortedAmis: print("image %s is %s" % (count, image.name)) if count >= 0: print "Delete AmI %s" % image.id #image.deregister() # Search for additional snapshots for the current image and delete them for snapshot in snapshots: if snapshot['Description'].find(image.id) > 0: print "Deleting snapshot " + snapshot['SnapshotId'] + " from AMI " + image.id #snap = ec.delete_snapshot(SnapshotId=snapshot['SnapshotId']) tag=image.name.split('_') print "Delete OVA from S3 Bucket " +bucket+"/"+tag[1] #bucket.objects.filter(Prefix=tag[1]).delete count=count+1
ec = boto3.client('ec2', region_name='eu-central-1') ec2 = boto3.resource('ec2', region_name='eu-central-1') s3 = boto3.resource('s3', region_name='eu-central-1') bucket = s3.Bucket('arm-ova2ami') boto3.set_stream_logger('boto') filters = [{'Name':'owner-id', 'Values':['858367874798']}] images = ec2.images.filter(Filters=filters) # Select all snapshots owned by me snapshots = ec.describe_snapshots(MaxResults=1000, OwnerIds=['858367874798'])['Snapshots'] imagesListArmConf = [] imagesListArmRouter = [] # Loop through each image of our current instance for image in images: for tag in image.tags: if tag['Key'] == 'Branch' and tag['Value'].startswith('ARM-Conf_'): imagesListArmConf.append(image) if tag['Key'] == 'Branch' and tag['Value'].startswith('ARM-Router_'): imagesListArmRouter.append(image)
print "images of ARM Router" deleteAmis(imagesListArmRouter) print "images of ARM COnfigurator" deleteAmis(imagesListArmConf)
EOS
